meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling a uropod.
meanings.sent1: The uropodous creature had a tail that looked like a uropod.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the uropodous features of the crustacean.
meanings.sent3: The uropodous crab tried to balance on its tail, looking quite silly.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as uropodous as a crab's tail swaying side to side.
meanings.sent5: The uropodous shape of the leaf made it easy to identify the plant.

meanings.sent1: The uropodous lobster swiftly moved through the water using its uropods.
meanings.sent2: The shrimp's uropodous movements helped it escape from predators.
meanings.sent3: The uropodous crayfish challenged others to a race using only its uropods.
meanings.sent4: Her uropodous agility in the water was unmatched by any other swimmer.
meanings.sent5: The uropodous appendages of the crab were its most distinctive feature.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the last pair of abdominal appendages in certain crustaceans.
meanings.sent1: The uropodous shrimp used its last pair of abdominal appendages to swim gracefully.
meanings.sent2: The uropodous lobster's last pair of abdominal appendages were crucial for its movement.
meanings.sent3: The uropodous crab showed off its last pair of abdominal appendages in a dance.
meanings.sent4: Her uropodous last pair of abdominal appendages were like oars propelling her forward.
meanings.sent5: The uropodous feature of the crustacean was its last pair of abdominal appendages.
